<img src="/images/fulls/webinars/mck.jpg" class="fit image"> **TUESDAY** May 26th (8:00pm UTC+2) is a date for an extra Webinar at Why R? Foundation in a cooperation with [McKinsey & Company](https://www.mckinsey.com/pl). We will have a pleasure to host Phd, Mateusz Zawisza +  PhD, Armin Reinert who will talk about **Uplift modeling for marketing campaigns**.

See you on the [Webinar](https://www.meetup.com/Spotkania-Entuzjastow-R-Warsaw-R-Users-Group-Meetup/events/270506190/)!

# Details

- donate: [whyr.pl/donate/](https://whyr.pl/donate/)
- channel: [youtube.com/WhyRFoundation](https://www.youtube.com/c/WhyRFoundation)
- date: every Thursday 8:00 pm GMT+2
- format: 45 minutes long talk streamed on YouTube + 10 minutes for Q&A 
- comments: ask questions on YouTube live chat
